comments.en:
Multifunction device: printer/scanner/copier/fax. The integrated flatbed scanner has an automatic document feeder and is legal-sized.

Prints perfectly with HP's "hpijs" driver and reasonably well (up to 600 dpi) with various "cdj*", "gimp-print"/"stp", or "pcl3"/"hpdj" drivers.

Best output quality reachable with the "hpijs" driver, especially the 1200-dpi high resolution mode gives excellent photo quality.

When used with HP's "hpijs" driver, this printer auto-detects the paper type and does appropriate dithering and colour adjustment internally, controlled by the hardware. So even when GhostScript with the "hpijs" driver only renders the image with 300 or 600 dpi, the 2400x1200 dpi are used for the internal dithering. So if you insert photo paper, the printer will print in its highest quality, no paper type choice in the driver's options is needed. There is also a special high resolution mode where the image is rendered in 1200 dpi, without paper detection, intended for photo paper only.

Scanning works using the HPOJ low-level driver together with its SANE backend "hpoj".

Copying works fine from the front panel.

PC-faxing is not supported with free software.

USB-only, optional adapter available for parallel connection.

For printing via USB you NEED to set up this printer with HPOJ or you have to use the modifed USB printer.c kernel module from the HPOJ web site, even if you do not want to scan or access photo memory cards from the PC.
